verses.text: \w Again|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w*, \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* same mother,

\w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, prostituting \w themselves|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*. \w Their|strong="H6213"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w fondled|strong="H1717"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1331"\w* bosoms caressed.

\w The|strong="H3205"\w* \w older|strong="H1419"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* Oholah,\f + \fr 23:4 \ft Oholah means her own tent or she worships at a tent shrine, a metaphor for Samaria as an adulteress with Assyria.\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* sister \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* Oholibah.\f + \fr 23:4 \ft Oholibah means the tent is in her or she is a tent shrine, a metaphor for Jerusalem as an adulterous wife.\f* \w They|strong="H3389"\w* \w became|strong="H3205"\w* Mine \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* identities, Oholah \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Oholibah \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Oholah \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* \w herself|strong="H5921"\w* \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* was still \w Mine|strong="H8478"\w*. \w She|strong="H5921"\w* \w lusted|strong="H5689"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w lovers|strong="H5689"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Assyrians—\w warriors|strong="H7138"\w*

\w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w and|strong="H8504"\w* commanders, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w desirable|strong="H2531"\w* \w young|strong="H2531"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w*, \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w mounted|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w steeds|strong="H6571"\w*.

\w She|strong="H1544"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w* sexual favors \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* elite \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria. \w She|strong="H1544"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w herself|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* whom \w she|strong="H1544"\w* \w lusted|strong="H5689"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* prostitution \w she|strong="H3588"\w* began \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, caressed \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1331"\w* \w bosom|strong="H1717"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w lust|strong="H8457"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w lovers|strong="H5689"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* whom \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w lusted|strong="H5689"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w exposed|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, \w seized|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* she \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w byword|strong="H8034"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8196"\w* \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H7200"\w* sister Oholibah \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w*, yet \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w lust|strong="H8457"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* prostitution she was \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w depraved|strong="H7843"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* sister.

She too \w lusted|strong="H5689"\w* after \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w*—\w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* commanders, \w warriors|strong="H1121"\w* \w dressed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* splendor, \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w steeds|strong="H6571"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w desirable|strong="H2531"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* too \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* herself; \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* taken \w the|strong="H7200"\w* same \w path|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* Oholibah \w carried|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* prostitution \w even|strong="H5921"\w* \w further|strong="H3254"\w*. \w She|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* men \w portrayed|strong="H2707"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, \w images|strong="H6754"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*,\f + \fr 23:14 \ft That is, the Babylonians\f* \w engraved|strong="H2707"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w vermilion|strong="H8350"\w*,

\w wearing|strong="H2289"\w* belts \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* waists \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w flowing|strong="H5628"\w* \w turbans|strong="H2871"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*; \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w looked|strong="H4758"\w* \w like|strong="H4758"\w* \w officers|strong="H7991"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Babylonians|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*,\f + \fr 23:15 \ft Or Babylonia; also in verse 16\f* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w birth|strong="H4138"\w*.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w lusted|strong="H5689"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylonians|strong="H1121"\w* came \w to|strong="H1121"\w* her, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w lust|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* her. \w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w after|strong="H1992"\w* she \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w been|strong="H2930"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w by|strong="H4904"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, she \w turned|strong="H1730"\w* away \w in|strong="H5315"\w* disgust.

\w When|strong="H5921"\w* Oholibah openly prostituted \w herself|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w exposed|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* turned \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* disgust, just \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H5315"\w* turned \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* sister.

\w Yet|strong="H3117"\w* she \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w her|strong="H7235"\w* promiscuity, \w remembering|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H7235"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* she \w had|strong="H7235"\w* \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* herself \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*

\w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w lusted|strong="H5689"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w lovers|strong="H5689"\w*, \w whose|strong="H6370"\w* genitals \w were|strong="H5483"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w whose|strong="H6370"\w* emission \w was|strong="H1320"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w stallions|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4616"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* revisited \w the|strong="H6213"\w* indecency \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* caressed \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w bosom|strong="H1717"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* pressed \w your|strong="H6213"\w* young \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*. Oholibah to Be Plagued

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, Oholibah, \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* incite \w your|strong="H5921"\w* lovers \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* turned away \w in|strong="H5921"\w* disgust. \w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* bring \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*—

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Babylonians|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pekod|strong="H6489"\w*, \w Shoa|strong="H7772"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Koa|strong="H6970"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w desirable|strong="H2531"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* commanders, \w officers|strong="H7991"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w renown|strong="H7121"\w*, \w mounted|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* host \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*,\f + \fr 23:24 \ft LXX They will all come against you from the north\f* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w weapons|strong="H2021"\w*, \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w wagons|strong="H1534"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* array \w themselves|strong="H7760"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w helmet|strong="H6959"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* delegate \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* punish \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* standards.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* jealous \w rage|strong="H2534"\w* \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w cut|strong="H5493"\w* \w off|strong="H5493"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* noses \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ears, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* survivors \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w seize|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* remnant \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* consumed \w by|strong="H5414"\w* fire.

\w They|strong="H3947"\w* will \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* \w off|strong="H6584"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w fine|strong="H3947"\w* \w jewelry|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w put|strong="H7673"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* \w end|strong="H7673"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* indecency \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w prostitution|strong="H2184"\w*, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* began \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* land \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w anymore|strong="H5750"\w*.’

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* disgust.

\w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w treat|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w which|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w worked|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w bare|strong="H6181"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w shame|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* prostitution \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w exposed|strong="H1540"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w indecency|strong="H6172"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* promiscuity
